text: This is the place where anybody - like an African American kid raised by a single mom - can be president.
author: Jennifer M. Granholm

text: You can be good at technology and like fashion and art. You can be good at technology and be a jock. You can be good at technology and be a mom. You can do it your way, on your terms.
author: Marissa Mayer

text: I slept with my mom until I was 16 years old.
author: Jennifer Hudson

text: If I could be a third of the woman that my mom is and have a third of the strength that she has, then I will have done good by this life.
author: Brittany Murphy

text: It's always been my mom and I against the world.
author: Brittany Murphy
